config.task: Create Pydantic models in src/models/ directory: brand.py (BrandColor, BrandFont, PhotographyStyle, LogoRules, ComprehensiveBrandGuidelines), localization.py (MarketSpecificRules, TranslationGlossary, LocalizationGuidelines), campaign.py (ProductInfo, CampaignMessage, AssetMetadata, CampaignBrief). Include __init__.py exports.

Implement src/genai/claude.py with ClaudeService class. Methods: extract_brand_guidelines(text, source), extract_localization_guidelines(text, source), localize_message(message, locale, guidelines). Use claude-sonnet-4-20250514, structured JSON output via Anthropic SDK, exponential backoff retry logic. Reference learned pattern: Claude Guideline Extraction.

Implement src/genai/firefly.py with FireflyService class. Methods: generate_image(prompt, size, content_class), generate_brand_compliant_prompt(product, brand_guidelines). Use Adobe Firefly API v3, OAuth + x-api-key auth, async aiohttp downloads, exponential backoff retry. Reference learned pattern: Adobe Firefly Integration (POST /v3/images/generate, pre-signed URLs).

Implement src/parsers/brand_parser.py (parse_brand_guidelines supporting PDF/DOCX/MD/TXT via PyMuPDF/python-docx, Claude extraction with regex fallback) and src/parsers/localization_parser.py (parse_localization_guidelines supporting YAML/JSON direct parsing, PDF/DOCX via Claude extraction). Include __init__.py.

Implement src/image_processor.py with ImageProcessor class. Methods: resize_to_aspect_ratio(image, ratio), apply_text_overlay(image, message, brand_guidelines), apply_brand_elements(image, logo_path, brand_guidelines), validate_brand_compliance(image, guidelines). Use Pillow (PIL) for image manipulation, support font rendering with brand fonts.

Implement src/storage.py with StorageManager class. Methods: create_campaign_directory(campaign_id), save_image(image, path), generate_report(campaign_data). Use directory hierarchy: output/campaign_id/{locale}/{product_id}/{aspect_ratio}/. Generate JSON and HTML reports with asset metadata, timings, and compliance status.

Implement src/pipeline.py with CampaignPipeline class. Main method: async process_campaign(brief: CampaignBrief) -> Dict. Orchestrate: (1) Load/parse guidelines, (2) Concurrent product processing, (3) Sequential locale processing per product with hero image reuse, (4) Parallel aspect ratio generation, (5) Report generation. Reference learned pattern: Multi-Locale Asset Generation. Target: <3 min for 2 products Ã— 2 locales.

Create comprehensive unit tests in tests/ directory for all implemented modules: test_models.py, test_claude_service.py, test_firefly_service.py, test_parsers.py, test_image_processor.py, test_storage.py, test_pipeline.py. Use pytest, mock external APIs (Claude, Firefly), test error handling and retry logic.
